name: Demon in a Slot Machine
description:
Try to defeat the demon in the slot machine.

LINK TO THE GAME:  http://game.kevinprehn.com/lowrezjam19/

This game creates POP UP WINDOWS so they must be allowed on the page to play

Since this game makes pop up windows, it is only hosted on the site above.

if you don't want to worry about pop ups on a stranger's website you can download the project files and run it on a local web server. I know this isn't very accessible but I was not very smart with how I made this game.

I made this after over a year of not doing any game dev so the project was honestly really thrown together. I just wanted to make SOMETHING so the results aren't great but I'm still glad I did it!

MADE FOR LOWREZJAM 2019 https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2019

GITHUB: https://github.com/kvn-prhn/LOWREZJAM19
